title: Calories in Tequila vs Vodka
meta_description: Discover calories in tequila vs vodka: both pack about 97 kcal per 1.5 oz shot with zero carbs or fat. Get full nutrition comparison and tweaks.
assumptions: Unflavored, 80-proof (40% ABV) tequila and vodka; standard 1.5 fl oz (44 ml) shot serving. No mixers, limes, or additives included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, proof, flavoring, and serving size. Calories from alcohol content; check labels for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A standard 1.5 oz shot of tequila or vodka has about 97 calories each, with no carbs, fat, or protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in tequila vs vodka?
faqs.a: Both have about 97 calories per 1.5 oz shot of 80-proof; essentially the same.

faqs.q: Does tequila have fewer calories than vodka?
faqs.a: No, unflavored 80-proof tequila and vodka are equal at ~97 kcal per shot.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in tequila or vodka?
faqs.a: Straight shots have 0g carbs; calories come purely from alcohol.

faqs.q: What about flavored tequila vs vodka?
faqs.a: Flavored versions add sugars, increasing calories by 50-150+ per shot depending on the flavor.

faqs.q: How does proof affect calories in tequila or vodka?
faqs.a: Higher proof means more alcohol and calories; e.g., 100-proof adds ~24 kcal per 1.5 oz shot.
